title: Serious: If Joe Biden is to win the election will I still be able to purchase an AK-47 or an AR15?
selftext: If Biden does win the Presidency, will I as a law abiding citizen still be able to purchase a semi automatic rifle for self defense/home defense purposes? Looking for some insight to see if Joe wants to ban purchasing of defense style rifles, or make the purchasing of them more difficult or expensive, etc. Thanks.
